pageContext.title: Markup: Title With Markup
pageContext.content:
Verify that:

  • The post title renders the word “with” in italics and the word “markup” in bold (and “up” is superscript).
  • The post title markup should be removed from the browser window / tab.
pageContext.excerpt: Verify that: The post title renders the word “with” in italics and the word “markup” in bold (and “up” is superscript). The post title markup should be removed from the browser window / tab.
